name: PDFActionRemoteGoTo
desc: PDFActionRemoteGoTo, a subclass of PDFAction, defines methods for getting and setting the destination of a go-to action that targets another document.

items.name: init(pageIndex: Int, at: CGPoint, fileURL: URL)
items.desc: Initializes the remote go-to action with the specified page index, point, and document URL.

items.name: var pageIndex: Int
items.desc: Returns the zero-based page index referenced by the remote go-to action.

items.name: var point: CGPoint
items.desc: Sets the point, in page space, on the page referenced by the remote go-to action.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: Returns the URL of the document referenced by the remote go-to action.
